io.github.nucleuspowered.nucleus.api.placeholder

Interface Placeholder.Option

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Placeholder, org.spongepowered.api.text.TextElement, org.spongepowered.api.text.TextRepresentable
    Enclosing interface:
    Placeholder

    public static interface Placeholder.Option
extends Placeholder
    A placeholder that represents a named option on a Subject.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.github.nucleuspowered.nucleus.api.placeholder.Placeholder

        Placeholder.Builder<O,T extends Placeholder.Builder<O,T>>, Placeholder.Option, Placeholder.OptionBuilder, Placeholder.Standard, Placeholder.StandardBuilder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.spongepowered.api.text.Text getDefault()
      Gets the default Text that is used if the option defined by the key getOptionKey() does not exist on the target SubjectReference.
      java.lang.String getOptionKey()
      Gets the key for the option to retrieve on the supplied SubjectReference.
      org.spongepowered.api.service.permission.SubjectReference getSubjectReference()
      Gets the SubjectReference that refers to the Subject that this placeholder refers to.
      org.spongepowered.api.text.serializer.TextSerializer getTextSerializer()
      The TextSerializer to use to translate the option value into Text

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.text.TextRepresentable

    • Method Detail

      • getDefault

        org.spongepowered.api.text.Text getDefault()
        Gets the default Text that is used if the option defined by the key getOptionKey() does not exist on the target SubjectReference.
        Returns:
        The default text

      • getOptionKey

        java.lang.String getOptionKey()
        Gets the key for the option to retrieve on the supplied SubjectReference.
        Returns:
        The key

      • getSubjectReference

        org.spongepowered.api.service.permission.SubjectReference getSubjectReference()
        Gets the SubjectReference that refers to the Subject that this placeholder refers to.

        It is important to note that the associated subject does not necessarily have to be the sender/invoker of a message, nor does it have to be the recipient. The subject is selected by the context of builder. It is up to plugins that use such placeholders to be aware of the context of which the placeholder is used.

        Returns:
        The SubjectReference

      • getTextSerializer

        org.spongepowered.api.text.serializer.TextSerializer getTextSerializer()
        The TextSerializer to use to translate the option value into Text
        Returns:
        The TextSerializer
